power.title: Binding Aegis
power.fluff: Your enemy is held fast by invisible magic bonds, and if it manages to escape your retribution will be swift

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature marked by your arcane aegis

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is held fast (save ends). The effect immediately ends if the target is no longed marked by your arcane aegis.

While it is held, the target is immobilized and immune to being pulled, pushed or slid. It must succeed on a saving throw to willingly teleport. You can use a free interrupt to temporarily suppress the immunity to forced movement.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: You can use a free reaction to teleport up to 10 squares to a space adjacent to the target, and use a melee at-will attack power against it.

power.title: Blade of Judgement
power.fluff: You pour arcane energy into improving your aegis

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 is hit by an enemy you have marked

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport the target to a space adjacent to you.
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).
